Title: Relates to tax check-off boxes on personal income tax return forms; repealer
Summary: Relates to tax check-off boxes on personal income tax return forms.
LawCode: Add §623, rpld §§625 - 630-d, Tax L; amd St Fin L, generally
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to tax check-off boxes on personal income tax return forms; and to repeal certain provisions of the tax law relating thereto
